segments.text: I can't help but laugh at the boy's determination to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's standing on looks like it's about to give way any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is being so patient, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a little river on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, she doesn't see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get caught in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in so much light, it's a beautiful day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really turn off that faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes on the counter are stacked neatly, ready to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this scene is a mix of chaos and calm, it's quite amusing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, it's a stark contrast to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
